name: Switcher Plus Pack 1
description:
Level pack for Switcher.

.iso files are full Sortix builds with the game set to automatically lauch with the level pack, and can be run in qemu, VirtualBox, or even real hardware (at least 128 MiB of RAM required). Sortix is free software and the source code can be examined at /src inside the live environment. The .iso files use the GRUB boot loader which is free software, and whose source can be downloaded below.

The .txt file is if you already have Switcher installed on your Sortix installation. You can run the level pack with

switcher plus-pack-1.txt
